alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:33AM MST until February 15 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM TUESDAY TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches from 5,000 to 7,000 ft and up to 11 inches above 7,000 ft. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, additional snow is expected Tuesday night. Additional snow accumulations will be similar to the first storm with 3 to 5 inches from 5,000 to 7,000 ft and up to 11 inches above 7,000 ft. Winds will be stronger with gusts as high as 75 mph Tuesday night. The combination of falling snow and the gusty winds will produce areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Galiuro, Pinaleno, Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM Tuesday to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven
